nodes.name: Sticky Note

parameters.content:
Connect your Google Sheets account.
Ensure your Google Sheet has clearly defined columns:

"Backlink URL": URL of the page containing the backlink.

"Landing page": The exact URL of your website page you're checking the backlink for.

Define your data range explicitly (e.g., D1:E) to accurately fetch these columns. The columns must be named exactly as specified to ensure the workflow functions correctly.

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note1

parameters.content:
## Configure your DataForSEO TASK POST NODE
(Basic Authentication). Insert your API key and password into n8n's Credentials settings. This node sends each URL/domain pair to the DataForSEO On-Page API for analysis.


Settings:

Method:POST

URL:{{ $env.API_BASE_URL }}

JSON body:

[{
  "target": "{{ $json.domain }}",
  "start_url": "{{ $json.url }}",
  "max_crawl_pages": 1
}]

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note2
nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note3

parameters.content:
## Send data to Google Sheets

This node updates your Google Sheet with backlink check results.

Map each column manually as follows:

Matching Column (used to find the correct row): Backlink URL

Backlink URL: {{ $('Loop Over Items').item.json.url }}

Status: {{ $json.status }}

Make sure these columns (Backlink URL and Status) already exist in your Google Sheet and have these exact names.

This will correctly update the backlink status (e.g., Live, Lost, or Lost (Nofollow)) based on each URL processed.

nodes.name: Workflow Documentation

parameters.content:
# Live link checker

## Overview
Automated workflow: Live link checker. This workflow integrates 8 different services: stickyNote, httpRequest, wait, code, stopAndError. It contains 19 nodes and follows best practices for error handling and security.

## Workflow Details
- **Total Nodes**: 19
- **Node Types**: 8
- **Error Handling**: ✅ Implemented
- **Security**: ✅ Hardened (no sensitive data)
- **Documentation**: ✅ Complete

## Node Breakdown
- **Loop Over Items**: splitInBatches
- **When clicking ‘Test workflow’**: manualTrigger
- **Reads Google Sheets**: googleSheets
- **Cleans backlink url**: code
- **Sends HTTP POST Request to DataForSEO**: httpRequest
- **Waits 20 seconds**: wait
- **Sends HTTP links request to DataforSeo**: httpRequest
- **Checks which backlinks exists on the landing page**: code
- **Sends data to Google sheets**: googleSheets
- **Sticky Note**: stickyNote
- ... and 9 more nodes

## Usage Instructions
1. **Configure Credentials**: Set up all required API keys and credentials
2. **Update Variables**: Replace any placeholder values with actual data
3. **Test Workflow**: Run in test mode to verify functionality
4. **Deploy**: Activate the workflow for production use

## Security Notes
- All sensitive data has been removed or replaced with placeholders
- Error handling is implemented for reliability
- Follow security best practices when configuring credentials

## Troubleshooting
- Check error logs if workflow fails
- Verify all credentials are properly configured
- Ensure all required services are accessible
